attributes.title: Don’t Download!!
attributes.review:
this app stole my mattress and wouldn’t give it back. it made me watch my fish drown. this is the worst app ever 

but for real. after i downloaded this, all of my social media got hacked. and it wouldn’t stop commenting this really disgusting phrase on my accounts: “T*ump 2020”
isn’t that terrible?! 

overall, this app is amazing ✨🧚‍♂️🥰 at being a piece of garbage ✨🧚‍♂️🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRENDOUS
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took $300 from my bank account!! Strangers showed up to my house the next day and stole my fridge and microwave. This is unbelievable. I want my money back😡😡

attributes.title: WACK
attributes.review: i expected so much more from this app (not really) but my phone slowed down when i downloaded it and i lost my dignity! don’t recommend!

attributes.title: 1 STAR
attributes.review: Omg this app is driving me crazy. Even when I was trying to put my dog to sleep it would keep buzzing and buzzing with notifications like. 1 star.

attributes.title: Bad bad bad
attributes.review: Horrible app, I thought that it would be great to keep up with the president but then the app glitched and he jumped out of the screen karate kicked my pet lion then vanished. would not recomend

attributes.title: Worst App
attributes.review: It keeps crashing my phone and it’s messing with all my other apps too. Highly don’t recommend this app

attributes.title: Worse app in the app store🤮
attributes.review: This app makes my phone glitch very badly and takes all my data and storage it also invaded my personal life. HACKS MY PHONE NUMBER

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I was on my phone and I set it and downloaded it but then I kept going on my other app then it just kicked me off so when I deleted the app it stopped

attributes.title: NO!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! I don’t recommend downloading it! Its trash. It fills up your storage and eat your dog! It makes your phone so glitchy that you could glitch out of your existence. Overall its terrible 🤮🤮🤮ew ew ew ew ew ew ew ew ew ew ew ew ew

attributes.title: Terrible Service
attributes.review: This is the worst app i've ever had in my life! The service is simply awful and disgusting. Please consider getting a different app.
